root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions indicating potential data entry errors or system integration issues
Bank duplicates suggest inadequate reconciliation processes
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential misstatement risk due to duplicate records

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation checks for AR entries and improve system integration protocols
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 75% in next period

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation procedures to include duplicate detection mechanisms
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate records in bank reconciliations
